entities.description: General term for various types of medicinal drugs.
Over-the-counter medication available without a prescription.
Medication that requires a prescription from a healthcare provider.
Physical or mental feature indicative of a condition or disease.
Specific health issues or diseases that the medications are treating or managing.

relationships.description: Indicates that over-the-counter medication is a type of general medication.
Indicates that prescription medication is a type of general medication.
Indicates that a medication is used to treat or manage a specific condition.
Indicates that a medication is used to alleviate or relieve a specific symptom.
